text: Balbodh Higher Secondary School (established in 1998 in Kanchan Rup Municipality, Saptari, Nepal) is government affiliated +2 Level, Higher Secondary Boarding School. ==References== Principal and Founder: MR.Sanjay Khadga ''' ==See also== *List of educational institutions in Kanchan Rup Category:Saptari District Category:Educational institutions established in 1998 Category:Secondary schools in Nepal Category:Boarding schools in Nepal Category:Universities and colleges in Nepal
title: Bal Bodh Higher Secondary School
